```diff
+             const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect();

+             const y = e.clientY - rect.top;
+             
+             const centerX = rect.width / 2;
+             const centerY = rect.height / 2;
+             
+             const rotateX = (y - centerY) / 10;
+             const rotateY = (centerX - x) / 10;
+             
+             card.style.transform = `perspective(1000px) rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg) translateY(-12px) scale(1.03)`;
+         });
+         
+         card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
+             card.style.transform = 'perspective(1000px) rotateX(0) rotateY(0) translateY(0) scale(1)';
+         });
+     });

+             const rect = this.getBoundingClientRect();
+             const size = Math.max(rect.width, rect.height);
+             const x = e.clientX - rect.left - size / 2;
+             const y = e.clientY - rect.top - size / 2;
+             
+             ripple.style.width = ripple.style.height = size + 'px';
+             ripple.style.left = x + 'px';
+             ripple.style.top = y + 'px';
+             ripple.classList.add('ripple');
+             
+             this.appendChild(ripple);
+             
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 ripple.remove();
+             }, 600);
+         });
+     });
```

```diff
  /* ä¸»æ ‡é¢˜æ ·å¼ */
```

```diff
@@ -881,4 +881,50 @@
  // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåæ‰§è¡Œ
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+     // è¯­è¨€åˆ‡æ¢åŠŸèƒ½
+     const langButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.lang-btn');
+     const body = document.body;
+     
+     // ä»localStorageè·å–ä¿å­˜çš„è¯­è¨€è®¾ç½®ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸ºè‹±æ–‡
+     const savedLang = localStorage.getItem('language') || 'en';
+     
+     // è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹è¯­è¨€
+     function setLanguage(lang) {
+         if (lang === 'zh') {
+             body.classList.add('language-zh');
+             body.classList.remove('language-en');
+         } else {
+             body.classList.add('language-en');
+             body.classList.remove('language-zh');
+         }
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
+         langButtons.forEach(btn => {
+             btn.classList.remove('active');
+             if (btn.dataset.lang === lang) {
+                 btn.classList.add('active');
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // ä¿å­˜è¯­è¨€è®¾ç½®
+         localStorage.setItem('language', lang);
+     }
+     
+     // åˆå§‹åŒ–è¯­è¨€
+     setLanguage(savedLang);
+     
+     // è¯­è¨€åˆ‡æ¢äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬
+     langButtons.forEach(btn => {
+         btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
+             const lang = this.dataset.lang;
+             setLanguage(lang);
+             
+             // æ·»åŠ åˆ‡æ¢åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
+             body.style.opacity = '0.8';
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 body.style.opacity = '1';
+             }, 200);
+         });
+     });
+     
      // ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰åŠ¨ç”»å…ƒç´ æ·»åŠ åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€
      const animatedElements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in-up, .fade-in-scale, .slide-in-left, .slide-in-right');
```
